content: पूर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [पुर्-क्त नि°] {@--1@} Filled, filled with, full of; opt. in comp; तं तथा कृपयाविष्टं अश्रुपूर्णाकुलेक्षणं <ls>Bg. 2. 1</ls>; so शोक°, जल° &c. {@--2@} Whole, full, entire, complete; <ls>R. 3. 38.</ls> {@--3@} Fulfilled, accomplished. {@--4@} Ended, completed. {@--5@} Past, elapsed. {@--6@} Satisfied, contented. {@--7@} Full-sounding, sonorous. {@--8@} Strong, powerful. {@--9@} Selfish, or self-indulgent. {@--10@} Drawn, bent (as a bow). --र्णा {@--1@} An epithet of the fifteenth digit of the moon. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the fifth, tenth, and fifteenth lunar days or {%tithis%}. --र्णं <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Abundance, plenty. {@--2@} Water.
